sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.EmailUtils</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Utility class for parsing emails; provides helper function that determines if VCAL calendar invitation is present in body of email message.</description>
        <name>EmailUtils</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var EmailUtils = Class.create();
EmailUtils.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

    containsCalendarInvite: function(/* com.glide.notification.Email */ email) {
        // Cheap way of parsing for VCAL attachment: look for BEGIN:VCALENDAR followed by END:VCALENDAR
        var vCalBeginIndex_text = email.body_text.toLowerCase().indexOf('begin:vcalendar');
        var vCalEndIndex_text = email.body_text.toLowerCase().indexOf('end:vcalendar');
        if (vCalBeginIndex_text > -1 && vCalEndIndex_text > vCalBeginIndex_text)
            return true;
        else
            return false;
    },

    type: 'EmailUtils'
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2012-01-20 20:52:29</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>8301c23b9723100031af390ddd2975e3</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>25</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>EmailUtils</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Email Filters" source="com.glide.email_filter">7fdc34c36d2220100acb70b35343307a</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_8301c23b9723100031af390ddd2975e3</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2012-01-23 21:40:41</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>653</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
